name: Lost Souls (VarcyonSariouGames)
description:
Global Game Jam 

Jan 29 - Jan 31 2021

There has been a NeitherQuake and your job is to find and save the lost spirits. Watch out there are enemies that want the spirits for themselves. Collect them all to win.
Point and click to move.
hold shift to stay still while holding the left mouse button to turn.
Q = area effect attack
E = forward attack
Spirits you collect will also heal you

Single person ( programmer ) Me: Brian Dornbusch

I made this in the very short time. Less than 24hours because I have been dealing with a lot of housing issues and stress but I still wanted to try and do something for this jam

Slimes are a free asset

player model is a from a pack I purched a while ago
